dict.string: This app needs access to your photo library to show past images.
This app uses your calendar to show past events from reflection dates.
This app tracks your location to show where you were on past dates when viewing reminders.
This app tracks your location in the background to build a history of where you've been. This allows you to see your movements on reflection dates in the future.
This app tracks your location in the background to build a history of where you've been. This allows you to see your movements on reflection dates in the future.
